definitions.text: try to stir up public opinion
cause to be agitated, excited, or roused
examples: The speaker charged up the crowd with his inflammatory remarks

definitions.text: exert oneself continuously, vigorously, or obtrusively to gain an end or engage in a crusade for a certain cause or person; be an advocate for
examples: The liberal party pushed for reforms
She is crusading for women's rights
The Dean is pushing for his favorite candidate

definitions.text: move or cause to move back and forth
examples: The chemist shook the flask vigorously

definitions.text: change the arrangement or position of
